name: Bread Defense
description:
Bread Defense is a game where you need to survive. 

In order to survive, you need to repair and upgrade your weapons. For that you need coins, every enemy drops one coin.  But spend your coins carefully, if you want to complete the game  you need to pay 150 coins.

Every night number of enemies increases. New enemies are faster and stronger. 

Game has content for 21 ingame days(something about 1 hour) everything from day 22 is playable, but doesn't increase number or health of enemies.

All game assets except code are in the folder.

Made with Python - Pygame
